title: Second time being banned, and i get a perm,
body:
played the game for about 3-4 years on this account, spend quite alot of money on this game, up to just now only been banned one other time.
the two games that are in question is one i just played where i had 3 feeders and a afk, all of which said and did worse than me, the other game i was toxic af i will admit that. and i do deserve to be penalized but not perma banned, even if they remove my chat for the next year it would be 10x better than losing all the money i sank into this game. will post chat logs below and would like to know if 1 game of me being toxic and another of me trying to deal with 3 feeders and a afk, deserves a perma.

replies.body: This looks pretty well deserved. I don't think you can type "%%%%" and expect there to be a reversal of your punishment. You were told after your 2 week that the next punishment would be a permaban.
If you really feel like you don't deserve it personally ticket riot you might be able to sort something out
